GitHub Education Standard University (per seat) University Unlimited
Price: What’s the cost? $0 25% discount off standard price $50,000 per year
Product offering: What kind of GitHub package is included? Business Cloud and Enterprise for all departments and students. Any specific number of seats on Business Cloud or Enterprise. Business Cloud and Enterprise for all departments and students.
Extras: What other software is included? All students have access to the Student Developer Pack, $12,000-worth of the best developer tools, free for students (distributed behind your firewall).
Account management: Who will help the IT department with set up and questions? Self service: help.github.com/enterprise/2.14/ and help.github.com. • Dedicated account management team
• Access to GitHub Paid Professional Services offerings
End-user support: Who will help students and teachers with support? Your school’s IT department—you will appoint a "Designated Administrator" that will set up and maintain GitHub at your school. • Non-urgent: 24/5 support with 8-hour response time
• Urgent: 24/7 with targeted response time 30 mins
• Additional Premium Support available for purchase
Legal: Contract changes and custom contracts The terms for GitHub Education are non-negotiable: education.github.com/partners/schools/terms. Standard GitHub boilerplate for any package under $50,000. Redlines and custom contract negotiation are possible.
Compliance & Renewal: what are the expectations of my school? Every department that uses GitHub must appoint one person as a "Campus Advisor" who completes GitHub Education’s online training. We’ll check in with you four times a year about each department. If you are in "Good Standing" after four quarters, we’ll renew the plan. See the terms for more detail. Package is provisioned and renewed with a new license annually or multi-year if preferred.
Next step: Who do I contact? Contact the education team through the form at education.github.com/partners/schools. Contact the sales team enterprise.github.com/contact.
